EmailTemplate.name: Send Sponser Lead Auto Response Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Your Sponsorship Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{{Recipient.LastName}}},
Thank you for your interest in sponsoring Dubai Dreamin Event. We appreciate your commitment to supporting our cause and helping us achieve our goals.
Your sponsorship request has been successfully received. Our team is currently reviewing it and will get back to you as soon a with further details regarding your sponsorship application.
In the meantime, if you have any questions or require additional information, please feel free to contact us at mhassan@cloud-1.co.
Thank you once again for considering sponsorship with us. We look forward to the possibility of collaborating with you and creating a mutually beneficial partnership.
Best regards,
Maham Hassan
